meanings.sent2: The mischannelled package ended up at the wrong address.
meanings.sent3: The mischannelled instructions led to a silly mix-up.
meanings.sent5: The mischannelled arrow missed its target by a mile.

meanings.definition: Sent in the wrong direction or to the wrong place
meanings.sent1: The mischannelled letter got lost in the mail.
meanings.sent2: The mischannelled train took us to the opposite side of town.
meanings.sent3: The mischannelled email made everyone laugh at the office.
meanings.sent4: His mischannelled steps led him astray in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The mischannelled river flowed backwards after the dam broke.
